articles.title: Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from Zambian Ambassador
articles.content:
Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from Zambian Ambassador
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, received credentials from Winnie Natala Chibesakunda, Zambian ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets Syrian Ambassador
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets Syrian Ambassador
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, had a talk with Tammam Sulaiman, Syrian ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him on Tuesday.

articles.title: ITF Executive Committee Meets
articles.content:
ITF Executive Committee Meets
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the Executive Committee of the International Taekwon-Do Federation took place in Pyongyang on Tuesday.
					 It was attended by President Ri Yong Son, Vice-President Leong Wai Meng and other members of the Executive Committee of the ITF.
					
					 Chairmen of the continental federations and representatives from the national associations under the ITF attended the meeting as observers.
					
					 The meeting discussed the issues of amending and supplementing the rules of the ITF and the regulations on Taekwon-Do games and refereeing and successfully holding Taekwon-Do Championships.

articles.title: Plenary Meeting of C.C., Chondoist Chongu Party Held
articles.content:
Plenary Meeting of C.C., Chondoist Chongu Party Held
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- A plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Chondoist Chongu Party took place here on Tuesday.
					 It was attended by members and alternate members of the Central Committee of the Chondoist Chongu Party, officials here and from local areas, and officials of the Central Guidance Committee of the Chondoist Association of Korea.
					
					 The meeting supported the Juche-based line and policies for national reunification set forth by supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and discussed measures for implementing them.
					
					 Yun Jong Ho, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Chondoist Chongu Party, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said the Chondoist Chongu Party fully supports the line and policies for national reunification set forth by Marshal Kim Jong Un at the Seventh Congress of the WPK, noting the line and policies fully reflect his firm faith and will to build a reunified power on this land without fail and serve as a great programme for reunification common to the nation.
					
					 They recalled the joint conference of the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK was held to carry out the policies set forth at the Seventh Congress of the WPK, at which an appeal to all Koreans was adopted.
					
					 Noting if a nationwide great meeting for reunification is held in the run-up to the 71st anniversary of the liberation of the country this year, it will provide a springboard from which to bring about a great turn and leap forward in the efforts for ensuring lasting peace of the country and repairing the north-south relations, they said they would take the lead in the efforts for realizing it.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not persist in sycophancy towards the U.S. and confrontation with the compatriots in the north but respond to the patriotic and constructive proposal of the DPRK with an honest and sincere approach, they urged.
					
					 They called on various political parities, organizations and personages in south Korea to turn out in the patriotic movement for opening up a new chapter for peace and independent reunification of the country.
					
					 The plenary meeting adopted a relevant decision and agreed to send letters to south Korean organizations.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Here
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Here
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Michiel Vreedenburgh, chief of the Implementation Planning and Support Section (Safety) of the Air Navigation Bureau of the International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO), and his party, and Javier Vicedo, representative of the European Aviation Safety Agency in Beijing, arrived here Tuesday to take part in the 16th coordinating committee meeting of the Cooperative Development of Operational Safety and Continuing Airworthiness Programme (COSCAP) of North Asia of the ICAO.
					 Arriving earlier were Jin Yibin, executive chairman of the 16th coordinating committee of the COSCAP of North Asia of the ICAO, a delegation of the Civil Aviation Authority of Mongolia led by Deputy  Director General Batchuluun Daadankhuu and a delegation of the Civil Aviation Administration of China led by Xin Tianhe.

articles.title: Homepage for Nursing and Upbringing of Children Opened
articles.content:
Homepage for Nursing and Upbringing of Children Opened
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Educators and researchers of Kim Il Sung University helped open a homepage for the nursing and upbringing of children at the Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage, true to the Workers' Party of Korea's love for posterity.
					 They established an e-health care system for children on the basis of normal indices related to their age, weight and nutritive conditions and a system for the nursing and upbringing of children. They also developed a system for improving the quality of nurses and employees and a system for integrated business management.
					
					 The homepage helps swap the achievements and experience gained in the nursing and upbringing of children, thus contributing to the development of children's intellectual faculties and the improvement of the nurses' qualifications.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Foreigners to take part in the 16th coordinating committee meeting of the Cooperative Development of Operational Safety and Continuing Airworthiness Programme of North Asia of the International Civil Aviation Organization visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Tuesday.
					 They laid a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Friendship Meeting with Participants in Int'l Juvenile Chopin Piano Contest Held
articles.content:
Friendship Meeting with Participants in Int'l Juvenile Chopin Piano Contest Held
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- A friendship meeting with the participants in the 24th International Juvenile Chopin Piano Contest took place at Kyongsang Kindergarten in Pyongyang on Tuesday.
					 Present at the meeting were members of the DPRK-Poland Friendship Association, officials concerned and kindergarten teachers.
					
					 Present there on invitation were Krzysztof Ciebien, Polish ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy, foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies and foreign embassy officials here.
					
					 A speaker said at the meeting that little prodigies proved successful in the piano contest as they have acquired their talents under the noble loving care of supreme leader Kim Jong Un for the younger generation and future.
					
					 Expressing hope that students and children of the DPRK will as ever achieve good successes in the international juvenile piano contest, the speaker expressed thanks to friends of Poland for paying deep attention to ensuring their successes in several contests.
					
					 Ma Sin A and Han Su Ryo who won high appreciation at the 24th piano contest played piano.

articles.title: Indian Embassy Officials Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Indian Embassy Officials Help Korean Farmers
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Ambassador Jasminder Kasturia and staff member of the Indian embassy here did friendship labor at the DPRK-India Friendship Kalchon Co-op Farm in Hanggu District, Nampho City on Tuesday.
					 They looked round the room for the education in the revolutionary history, being briefed on the leadership feats the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu performed on the farm.
					
					 The guests helped the farmers in weeding maize field.

articles.title: Lao Party Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Lao Party Delegation Leaves
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party (LPRP) headed by Sounthon Sayachak, member of the Central Committee of the LPRP and chairwoman of the Committee for External Affairs of its Central Committee, left here for home on Tuesday.

articles.title: World Blood Donor Day Marked
articles.content:
World Blood Donor Day Marked
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- There took place an event to mark the World Blood Donor Day at the National Blood Center under the Ministry of Public Health of the DPRK on Tuesday.
					 Present there were officials in the field of public health, officials concerned, voluntary blood donors, the UN resident coordinator who is the UNDP resident in the DPRK, the acting representative of the WHO and members of the missions of international organizations in the DPRK, a delegation of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies working in the DPRK and staff members of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Speakers expressed thanks to the blood donors for donating precious blood before referring to the successes and experience gained in the field of blood transfusion.
					
					 They said observing World Blood Donor Day is aimed to fully supply safe blood and blood products by voluntary unpaid blood in all countries, calling for activating blood donation.
					
					 Certificates and souvenirs were handed over to voluntary blood donors at the event. 
					
					 The participants looked round photos showing blood-donating activities before enjoying a performance given by the Central Art Squad for Agitation for Increased Production.
					
					 They went round the blood-gathering room and played sports and amusement games.
					
					 The Day was also observed in all provinces on the same day.

articles.title: New Salt Production Method Established in DPRK
articles.content:
New Salt Production Method Established in DPRK
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- A method of producing salt from underground ultra-saline water has been established at salterns in the west coastal area of the DPRK.
					 The Kwisong Saltern began its salt production with this method last year and turned out more than 7 000 tons of salt in over 150 hectares of fields between early March and mid-May this year.
					
					 The Yonbaek Saltern changed all its production processes into those producing salt from underground ultra-saline water, increasing the salt production two to five times.
					
					 Such successes are also reported from other salterns in the country, which has rich underground ultra-saline water resources of high economic value.
					
					 The salt from underground ultra-saline water contains more potassium and iodine than that from seawater.
					
					 Since 2008 a work has been successfully done to secure promising deposits of underground ultra-saline water and drill for them at Kwisong, Namyang and Yonbaek salterns and Kwangmyongsong Saltern in the east coastal area of the country.

articles.title: EPN Applied to Disinsection in DPRK
articles.content:
EPN Applied to Disinsection in DPRK
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The Plant Protective Institute of the Academy of Agricultural Science in the DPRK succeeded in applying entomo-pathogenic nematode (EPN) to disinsection.
					 EPN gives no adverse effect on environment and has high ability of disinsection.
					
					 It costs lower than chemical pesticide.
					
					 The institute analyzed some 1,600 soil samples in the areas of North and South Hwanghae and North Phyongan provinces, in order to confirm the species of EPN.
					
					 Then, it intensified research into applying EPN into farming by mass-producing it through semisolid culture.
					
					 The institute put the EPN production on an industrial basis while building its production bases in different parts of the country.
					
					 The application of EPN into farming can increase crop yield up to 10 percent.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Allurement and Abduction of Women of DPRK Will Never Be Pardoned: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Allurement and Abduction of Women of DPRK Will Never Be Pardoned: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- These days the public in south Korea is becoming increasingly vocal chiding the allurement and abduction of citizens of the DPRK by gangsters of the puppet Intelligence Service and actions are being intensified to probe the truth behind the crime. However, the group of the Intelligence Service turned down the demand of people of different social standings of south Korea under an unreasonable pretence. In May last, too, they paid no heed to the demands of civic organizations for opening the news about the abductees in custody and interview with them. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 They are shamelessly behaving like a thief crying "Stop the thief!" far from making an apology for the above-said crime and probing the truth behind it, touching off surging hatred and resentment among all Koreans.
					
					 Their reckless act is nothing but a despicable plot to advertise "defection from the north according to their free will" and divert attention of the people elsewhere by cooking up the "north wind" and tide over an extreme ruling crisis.
					
					 The reality goes to prove that the south Korean conservative group has not an iota of intention to improve the inter-Korean relations together with the north but is seeking the ambition for escalating the confrontation with it.
					
					 The DPRK will never pardon the gangsters of the Intelligence Service involved in the crime but mercilessly punish them by chasing them to the last.

articles.title: It Is Vital for U.S. to Make Policy Switchover: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
It Is Vital for U.S. to Make Policy Switchover: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The Cato Research Institute in the U.S. posted on its website an article saying that U.S. politicians are working hard to exhort different countries while visiting them, but governments of the relevant countries turn their deaf ears to them and behave in their interests, not in those of the U.S. The successive U.S. administrations have made a lot of efforts to instill the U.S.-style view on the value into different countries of the world and vaunted their scenarios to deter the DPRK's nuclear development, but none of them has been realized, it noted.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is no more than due denunciation and a sort of warning for the U.S. administration which is dashing ahead along the road of isolation and self-destruction in pursuance of the strong arm policy, obsessed with an anachronistic conception, failing to understand the changed world today.
					
					 The end of the U.S. era is becoming reality, no longer remaining an abstract conception.
					
					 It is an anachronistic act of going against the trend of the times for the U.S. to cling to its policy of force now that much water has flown under the bridge since the demise of the Cold War.
					
					 Making a policy switchover away from the policy of force is the way out for the U.S. to get rid of the serious economic crisis.
					
					 What is the most urgent for the U.S. in making a policy switchover is to roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 For the U.S. to break with the above-said policy is not a gift for someone. This is a vital issue directly linked with the issue of the U.S. rise or fall.
					
					 The U.S. politicians should behave with reason, though belatedly, if they are to escape the disgrace of disruption.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts S. Korean Authorities' "Diplomacy for Pressurizing North"
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts S. Korean Authorities' "Diplomacy for Pressurizing North"
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean conservative ruling forces are staging such burlesque as "diplomacy for pressurizing the north" while bluffing that they "would concentrate all efforts on isolating the north in the international community." The main player is none other than the boss of Chongwadae and the puppet ministers and vice-ministers of foreign affairs and defense are echoing her outbursts by conducting "diplomatic offensive" of their own style.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Tuesday says this proves that the puppet forces have not yet awakened from the wild dream of "making the social system in the north collapse," their long-harbored scenario.
					
					 The historic declaration that was made at the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea, promising the prosperity of the great Paektusan nation has aroused great repercussion among Koreans and the world people, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 However, only the south Korean conservative ruling forces are beating harder the worn-out drum of confrontation with the north, persistently swimming quite contrary to the trend of the times toward dialogue and peace. This proves that the conservative forces' burlesque of "diplomacy for pressurizing the north" has reached the zenith.
					
					 The south Korean authorities' above-said farce is no more than  a childish act of an imbecile unaware of where he stands, being seized by the wild ambition to force the "north to dismantle its nukes."
					
					 The south Korean authorities' farce is the last-ditch efforts to escape their final ruin as they are sustaining repeated setbacks in the confrontation with the DPRK and it is, at the same time, little short of pricking one's own eyes and strangling one's own neck.
					
					 No matter how frantically the puppet forces may resort to the farce of "diplomacy for pressurizing the north" and confrontation racket under the pretext of its nuclear issue, they can never deter the DPRK from making a dynamic advance while demonstrating the might of a nuclear power along the road of simultaneous development of the two fronts.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Police Search House of Pro-Reunification Campaigner
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Police Search House of Pro-Reunification Campaigner
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet police searched the house of a member of the Taegu and Kyongbuk Federation of the South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification on June 9, according to the south Korean Newsis.
					 The puppet police committed such action on charges of violation of the "National Security Law" for the mere reason that he had information praising the north saved in his computer.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Anti-Reunification Move under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Anti-Reunification Move under Fire
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Ri Chang Bok, permanent representative of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, denounced the puppet authorities for checking the reunification movement, in his lecture given at the meeting room of the South Kyongsang Provincial Headquarters of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions on June 9, according to the south Korean online paper Oh My News.
					 He said the authorities disallowed the attendance of a south side delegation at the June 15 national event.
					
					 He held that the authorities are obstructing the national event, prompted by their anti-reunification way of thinking, adding that, therefore, they shut down the Kaesong Industrial Zone which served as a link in the inter-Korean relations, and are pressurizing the north.
					
					 But nothing can halt the reunification movement and it represents the destiny of the nation and its task, he noted.
					
					 He underscored the need to create an atmosphere for inter-Korean dialogue and a DPRK-U.S. dialogue to defuse the tension on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Russia
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Russia
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was inaugurated by the Karelia-DPRK Friendship Association of Russia on June 9.
					 Viktor Yegorov, chairman of the Karelia-DPRK Friendship Association of Russia, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events praising the immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and take measures for supporting the cause of the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Party-Building Exploits Lauded by British Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Party-Building Exploits Lauded by British Organizations
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK issued a joint statement on June 9 on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The statement said:
					
					 The great Comrade Kim Jong Il's start of work at the C.C., WPK on June 19, Juche 53 (1964) marked a historic event of special significance in developing the party and accomplishing the cause of the Juche revolution.
					
					 Thanks to his wise leadership, the WPK could demonstrate before the world its dignity as the party which sheds rays along with the august name of President Kim Il Sung and the tested and invincible one which leads the cause of the Songun revolution.
					
					 He formulated the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung as the integral system of ideology, theory and method of Juche and great revolutionary idea in the era of independence which can be called only with the august name of Kim Il Sung, and proclaimed it as the supreme programme of the party to model the whole society on Kimilsungism.
					
					 The Songun politics in which the military affairs are regarded as the most important one of the state affairs and the overall revolution and construction are pushed forward with the army as a pillar and main force are an original political mode pursued by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by British Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by British Body
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The full text of Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was posted by the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on its website on June 9.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies that it is the principled requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of the Korean revolution to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and indicates the tasks for steadily strengthening the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Unethical Act Denounced by Nigerian Political Figure
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Unethical Act Denounced by Nigerian Political Figure
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Damian Ogbonna, national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria, issued a statement on June 8.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The south Korean authorities' allurement and abduction of the DPRK's citizens are a crucial provocation against the DPRK and the worst human rights abuse.
					
					 Such acts which instigate confrontation between fellow countrymen are driving the situation on the Korean peninsula which has become the acutest area in the world to more serious phase.
					
					 These are a raw show of the south Korean authorities' anti-national act to chill the DPRK's efforts for detente and national reunification and ignite a war in collusion with outsiders.
					
					 The People's Progressive Party of Nigeria strongly accuses the south Korean authorities of their unethical crime against the DPRK's citizens.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should immediately send the DPRK's citizens back home.
					
					 They would be well advised to do things helpful to detente on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Abduction of DPRK Citizens Censured in Peru and Nigeria
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Abduction of DPRK Citizens Censured in Peru and Nigeria
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- A Peruvian organization and a Nigerian figure vehemently denounced the south Korean puppet group for committing the thrice-cursed allurement and abduction of citizens of the DPRK.
					 The Peru-Korea Institute of Culture and Friendship said in a statement on June 8:
					
					 We bitterly condemn the south Korean puppet forces for alluring and abducting women citizens of the DPRK to south Korea.
					
					 The above-said citizens were abducted by the south Korean authorities, but they are claiming that the citizens "made a group defection from the north".
					
					 Why don't the south Korean authorities persistently turn down the request of the parents of the abductees to meet their daughters if this were true?
					
					 We demand the south Korean authorities take a necessary measure to let the abductees reunite their parents at the earliest possible date as requested by them.
					
					 Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria, made public a statement on June 9.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 As already reported, the south Korean puppet group hurled gangsters of the Intelligence Service into a hideous operation for luring and abducting a group of women employees of the DPRK in Ningbo, Zhejiang Province, China to south Korea in broad daylight early in April.
					
					 This was a hideous criminal act against the DPRK and the most cruel human rights abuse in the world.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should apologize to the DPRK for their thrice-cursed inhumane act and send back all the women of the DPRK without delay so that they may reunite their parents.

articles.title: Korean People Will Certainly Reunify Country: Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Korean People Will Certainly Reunify Country: Swiss Organizations
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The Korean people will certainly reunify the country under the guidance of the respected HE Kim Jong Un, smashing the moves of the anti-reunification forces.
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a joint statement on June 7.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The June 15 North-South Joint Declaration adopted in the noble idea of Chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK Kim Jong Il on national reunification is the great programme for Korea's independent reunification.
					
					 Thanks to the declaration, the north and the south of Korea could greet the June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 The pro-U.S., conservative and anti-reunification forces which newly took power in south Korea totally denied the implementation of the north-south joint declarations under the patronage of the U.S.
					
					 The anti-reunification forces bedeviled the north-south relations and pushed the situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of a war.
					
					 However, the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the DPRK are carrying forward the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The policies for national reunification advanced in the report made at the 7th Congress of the WPK are the Juche-oriented line for reunifying Korea independently.
					
					 Such line reflects the idea of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on loving the country and the nation.
					
					 The June 15 era of reunification and the idea of By Our Nation Itself can never be checked.

articles.title: DPRK's Significant Days Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Significant Days Marked Abroad
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- There were workshops in the Czech Republic and Ethiopia from June 6 to 8 to mark the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 16th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The chairperson of the Nymburk County Committee of the Communist Party of Czech and Moravia praised Kim Jong Il, eternal leader of the WPK, as a great man who made an immortal contribution to party building, defense of socialism and the cause of achieving the peace and reunification on the Korean peninsula, and went on:
					
					 His start of work at the Central Committee of the WPK marked a historic event that made it possible to victoriously advance the cause of socialism by developing the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The three charters for national reunification set forth by the President and the June 15 joint declaration provided by Kim Jong Il serve as the fundamental bedrock and banner of the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					 The chairperson expressed the belief that the Korean people will thoroughly implement the decision made at the Seventh Congress of the WPK to build a socialist power and achieve the country's reunification under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chief of the group of the Bole branch of the Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and another chief said in their reports that Kim Jong Un put forward the vital tasks for reunifying the country at the said congress.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should accept the DPRK's proposal on opening up a new era for the improvement of inter-Korean relations and movement for national reunification by joining hands together as companions in achieving reunification, and respect and constantly fulfill the agreements common to the nation, they noted.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de nueva embajadora de Zambia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de nueva embajadora de Zambia
Pyongyang, 14 de junio (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio hoy en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae las cartas credenciales de Winnie Natala Chibesakunda que le acreditan como nueva embajadora de la Republica de Zambia en la RPDC. 
					Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con la diplomatica.

articles.title: Efectuada sesion plenaria de CC de Partido Chondoista Chong-U
articles.content:
Efectuada sesion plenaria de CC de Partido Chondoista Chong-U
Pyongyang, 14 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 14 en esta capital la sesion plenaria del Comite Central del Partido de Chondoista Chong-U con la participacion de los miembros y miembros suplentes del CC del partido, los funcionarios de la central y las localidades y los funcionarios del comite de direccion central de la Asociacion de Chondoistas de Corea. 
					El foro expreso apoyo a la autoctona linea y orientacion por la reunificacion de la patria, presentadas por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y discutio las medidas para materializarlas.
					
					Hubo el informe de Yun Jong Ho, vicepresidente del CC del Partido Chondoista Chong-U, y las intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores senalaron que la linea y la orientacion sobre la reunificacion de la patria, presentadas por el Mariscal en el Septimo Congreso del PTC, es el fruto de la ferrea conviccion y voluntad de construir a toda costa una potencia reunificada en este territorio y deviene un gran programa comun de reunificacion de la nacion. Anadieron que el Partido Chondoista Chong-U apoya totalmente esa linea y la orientacion. 
					
					Se refirieron a la conferencia conjunta del gobierno, los partidos politicos y las entidades de la RPDC efectuada para llevar a feliz termino la orientacion sobre la reunificacion de la patria presentada en el congreso citado y al llamamiento a toda la nacion coreana aprobado en ella. 
					
					Acotaron que si se realiza este ano una gran reunion pannacional de reunificacion con motivo del 71o aniversario de la liberacion de la patria esto servira de un trampolin para lograr grandes cambios y saltos en el aseguramiento de la paz duradera y las relaciones intercoreanas. Y expusieron sus decisiones de esforzares activamente por el respecto. 
					
					Prosiguieron que las autoridades surcoreanas no deben recurrir al servilismo proyanqui y la confrontacion fratricida, sino aceptar con sinceridad la propuesta patriotica y constructiva de la RPDC. 
					
					Llamaron a todos los partidos politicos, las entidades y personalidades de diferentes estratos surcoreanos a levantarse en el movimiento patriotico para abrir la nueva coyuntura de la paz y reunificacion independiente del pais. 
					
					La sesion adopto una resolucion correspondiente y decidio enviar las cartas a las entidades surcoreanas.

articles.title: Celebran en RPDC el Dia Mundial de Donantes de Sangre
articles.content:
Celebran en RPDC el Dia Mundial de Donantes de Sangre
Pyongyang, 14 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 14 en el Centro de Transfusion de Sangre del Ministerio de Salud Publica de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea el acto por el Dia Mundial de Donantes de Sangre.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los funcionarios de la rama de salud publica y de otros dominios relacionados, los donantes voluntarios de sangre, el coordinador permanente de la ONU y representante permanente del Programa de las Naciones Unidas para el Desarrollo, el representante interino de la Organizacion Mundial de la Salud y otros miembros de las oficinas de organizaciones internacionales en Corea, la delegacion de la Federacion Internacional de Sociedades de la Cruz Roja y la Medialuna Roja, que trabaja en Corea, y los integrantes de las embajadas de varios paises en Corea.
					
					En el acto hubo intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores expresaron agradecimiento a los voluntarios que donan la sangre preciosa y se refirieron a los exitos y experiencias logrados en la transfusion de sangre del pais.
					
					Subrayaron que el objeto de celebracion de este dia reside en asegurar suficientemente la segura sangre y los productos de sangre a traves de la voluntaria y gratuita transfusion de sangre y apuntaron la necesidad de participar activamente en esta labor.
					
					En la ocasion fueron entregados los diplomas y recuerdos a los donantes de sangre.
					
					Los participantes pasaron revista a las fotos alusivas a las actividades de la transfusion de sangre y presenciaron la funcion del grupo central de propaganda artistica.
					
					Tras recorrer la sala de toma de sangre, realizaron juegos deportivos y recreativos.
					
					El mismo dia, tuvieron lugar semejantes actividades en todas las provincias.

articles.title: Abierta nueva pagina web en Hospicio de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Abierta nueva pagina web en Hospicio de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 14 de junio (ACNC) -- Los profesores e investigadores de la Universidad Kim Il Sung abrieron en el Hospicio de Pyongyang la pagina web relativa al cuidado de  la salud, crianza y educacion y la gestion combinada de trabajo en acato al amor del Partido del Trabajo de Corea por las generaciones venideras.
					El colectivo de investigacion al tener enlace con varios organos medicos del pais incluso el Hospital de Pediatria de Okryu establecio el sistema electronico para el cuidado de salud infantil, tras definir los indices normales correspondientes a la edad, peso, constitucion fisica y estado nutritivo de los ninos.
					
					Ademas, desarrollo el programa capaz de evaluar y analizar el estado de evolucion de inteligencia de los huerfanos segun sus edades, y ademas establecio el sistema que permite a las educadoras y empleadas elevar el nivel de crianza y educacion y el otro para administracion combinada de trabajo.
					
					Las informaciones referidas a la temperatura de cuerpo, el peso, etc. de los huerfanos medidos por dias y noches en el Hospicio de Pyongyang se registran en la computadora y se globalizan en el servidor por conducto de la red de radiocomunicaciones, lo cual contribuye al cuidado de salud de los ninos.
					
					Se comparten en la pagina web los exitos y datos de experiencias alcanzados en el cuidado y educacion, lo cual permite desarrollar con armonia la inteligencia de los huerfanos y mejorar la capacidad de las educadoras.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia "diplomacia de presion anti-Norte" del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia "diplomacia de presion anti-Norte" del Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 14 de junio (ACNC) -- Ahora, las fuerzas conservadores en el Poder del Sur de Corea orquestan la farsa de la "diplomacia de presion anti-Norte" fanfarroneando que "concentraran todas las fuerzas en los trabajos para aislar al Norte en la sociedad internacional". La protagonista de esta farsa es indudablemente la mandataria surcoreana Park Geun-hye y se le adhieren con el coro de "ofensivas diplomaticas" los ministros y viceministros de Relaciones Exteriores y de Defensa. 
					El hecho demuestra que los titeres surcoreanos no se liberan  todavia del absurdo sueno de lograr el "derrumbe institucional" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este martes y continua:
					
					La declaracion historica hecha en el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea asegura la prosperidad de la potencia Paektusan y produce grandes repercusiones en la nacion coreana y todo el mundo. 
					
					Tales absurdos actos de las fuerzas conservadoras surcoreanas que dan espaldas a la corriente de la epoca por el dialogo y la paz y se entregan obstinadamente al enfrentamiento con la parte connacional demuestran que la farsa de la irrealizable "diplomacia de presion anti-Norte" de las autoridades surcoreanas se llego al climax. 
					
					Esta farsa no pasa de ser un acto desesperado y de suicida de quienes sufren derrotas sucesivas en la confrontacion con la RPDC. 
					
					Por mas que los titeres surcoreanos recurran a esa farsa cuestionando el problema nuclear, no pueden detener nunca el avance vigoroso de la RPDC que exalta el poderio de la potencia nuclear manteniendo la linea de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas armadas nucleares.
